verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> Are Gathered Together <S%G4863><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes, <S%G1122><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem; <S%G2414><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> Of His Disciples <S%G846><s%> With Defiled <S%G2839><s%> Hands, <S%G5495><s%> ' That <S%G5124><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Unwashed, <S%G449><s%> Eating <S%G2068><s%> Bread, <S%G740><s%> They Found Fault; <S%G3201><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> ? With The Fist? <S%G4435><s%> They Wash <S%G3538><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hands, <S%G5495><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Eat Not, <S%G2068><s%> Holding <S%G2902><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tradition <S%G3862><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Elders; <S%G4245><s%>

And On Coming <S%G2532><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The Market, <S%G58><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> They Wash Themselves <S%G907><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Eat Not; <S%G2068><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Other Things <S%G243><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> There Are <S%G2076><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> They Received <S%G3880><s%> To Hold, <S%G2902><s%> Washings <S%G909><s%> Of Cups <S%G4221><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Vessels <S%G3582><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Brazen Utensils <S%G5473><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Couches : <S%G2825><s%>

Then <S%G1899><s%> Question <S%G1905><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes, <S%G1122><s%> <S%G1223><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> Thy Disciples <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Walk Not <S%G4043><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tradition <S%G3862><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Elders, <S%G4245><s%> But <S%G235><s%> With Unwashed <S%G449><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Eat <S%G2068><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Bread? <S%G740><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Them, <S%G3754><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> Prophesied <S%G4395><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> It Has Been Written, <S%G1125><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Lips <S%G5491><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> <S%G5091><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Honour, <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2588><s%> But Their Heart <S%G846><s%> Far <S%G4206><s%> Is Away <S%G568><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Me. <S%G1700><s%>
<S%G3155><s%> But In Vain <S%G1161><s%> They Worship <S%G4576><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> Teaching As <S%G1321><s%> Teachings <S%G1319><s%> Injunctions <S%G1778><s%> Of Men. <S%G444><s%>

<S%G863><s%> For, Leaving <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Commandment <S%G1785><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Ye Hold <S%G2902><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tradition <S%G3862><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Men, <S%G444><s%> Washings <S%G909><s%> Of Vessels <S%G3582><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cups, <S%G4221><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Like Things <S%G3946><s%> Such <S%G5108><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Ye Do. <S%G4160><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> Do Ye Set Aside <S%G114><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Commandment <S%G1785><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3862><s%> Your Tradition <S%G5216><s%> Ye May Observe. <S%G5083><s%>

<S%G3475><s%> For Moses <S%G1063><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Honour <S%G5091><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Thy Father <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> Thy Mother; <S%G4675><s%> And, <S%G2532><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Speaks Evil Of <S%G2551><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Mother <S%G3384><s%> By Death <S%G2288><s%> Let Him Die. <S%G5053><s%>

<S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> Say, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Say <S%G2036><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Father <S%G3962><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mother, It Is <S%G3384><s%> A Corban, <S%G2878><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> <S%G1435><s%> A Gift, <S%G3739><s%> Whatever <S%G1437><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> Thou Mightest Be Profited By : <S%G5623><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> No Longer <S%G3765><s%> Ye Suffer <S%G863><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Anything (lit. Nothing) <S%G3762><s%> To Do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> For His Father <S%G846><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%>, His Mother, <S%G846><s%>

Making Void <S%G208><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3862><s%> By Your Tradition <S%G5216><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Ye Have Delivered; <S%G3860><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Like Things <S%G3946><s%> Such <S%G5108><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Ye Do. <S%G4160><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Called To Him <S%G4341><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> He Said <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Hear Ye <S%G191><s%> Me, <S%G3450><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Understand : <S%G4920><s%>

Nothing <S%G3762><s%> There Is <S%G2076><s%> From Without <S%G1855><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Entering <S%G1531><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Defile; <S%G2840><s%> But <S%G235><s%> The Things Which <S%G3588><s%> Go Out <S%G1607><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%>, Him, <S%G846><s%> Those <S%G1565><s%> Are <S%G2076><s%> The Things Which <S%G3588><s%> Defile <S%G2840><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man. <S%G444><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> Ears <S%G3775><s%>, To Hear, <S%G191><s%> Let Him Hear. <S%G191><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> He Went <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A House <S%G3624><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> Asked <S%G1905><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Parable. <S%G3850><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Without Understanding <S%G801><s%> Are? <S%G2075><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Perceive Ye Not <S%G3539><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Everything <S%G3956><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> From Without <S%G1855><s%> Enters <S%G1531><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not Able <S%G1410><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Defile? <S%G2840><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Enters Not <S%G1531><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heart, <S%G2588><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Belly, <S%G2836><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Draught <S%G856><s%> Goes Out, <S%G1607><s%> Purifying <S%G2511><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Food. <S%G1033><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> And He Said, <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Goes Forth, <S%G1607><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> Defiles <S%G2840><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man. <S%G444><s%>

<S%G2081><s%> For From Within <S%G1063><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Men <S%G444><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Reasonings <S%G1261><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Evil <S%G2556><s%> Go Forth, <S%G1607><s%>, Adulteries, <S%G3430><s%> Fornications, <S%G4202><s%> Murders, <S%G5408><s%>

Thefts, <S%G2829><s%> Covetous Desires, <S%G4124><s%> Wickednesses, <S%G4189><s%> Guile, <S%G1388><s%> Licentiousness, <S%G766><s%> An Eye <S%G3788><s%> Wicked, <S%G4190><s%> Blasphemy, <S%G988><s%> Haughtiness, <S%G5243><s%> Folly : <S%G877><s%>
All <S%G3956><s%> These <S%G5023><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Evils <S%G4190><s%> From Within <S%G2081><s%> Go Forth, <S%G1607><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Defile <S%G2840><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man. <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Thence <S%G1564><s%> Having Risen Up <S%G450><s%> He Went Away <S%G565><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Borders <S%G3181><s%> Of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sidon; <S%G4605><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House, <S%G3614><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> He Wished <S%G2309><s%> To Know It, <S%G1097><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Could Not <S%G1410><s%> Be Hid. <S%G2990><s%>

Having Heard <S%G191><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> A Woman <S%G1135><s%> About <S%G4012><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2365><s%> Her Little Daughter <S%G846><s%> A Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Unclean, <S%G169><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Fell <S%G4363><s%> At <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> His Feet, <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> now Was <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> A Greek, <S%G1674><s%> Syrophoenician <S%G4949><s%> <S%G3588><s%> By Race, <S%G1085><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Asked <S%G2065><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demon <S%G1140><s%> He Should Cast Forth <S%G1544><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Daughter <S%G2364><s%> Her. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Her, <S%G846><s%> Suffer <S%G863><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> To Be Satisfied <S%G5526><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Children; <S%G5043><s%> <S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Is It <S%G2076><s%> To Take <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bread <S%G740><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Children, <S%G5043><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cast It <S%G906><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Dogs. <S%G2952><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But She <S%G1161><s%> Answered <S%G611><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%>, Yea, <S%G3483><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> <S%G2532><s%> For Even <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Dogs <S%G2952><s%> Under <S%G5270><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Table <S%G5132><s%> Eat <S%G2068><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crumbs <S%G5589><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Children. <S%G3813><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Her, <S%G846><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5126><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Go; <S%G5217><s%> Has Gone Forth <S%G1831><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demon <S%G1140><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2364><s%> Thy Daughter. <S%G4675><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone Away <S%G565><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3624><s%> Her House, <S%G846><s%> She Found <S%G2147><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demon <S%G1140><s%> Had Gone Forth, <S%G1831><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Daughter <S%G2364><s%> Laid <S%G906><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bed. <S%G2825><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Having Departed <S%G1831><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Borders <S%G3725><s%> Of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sidon, <S%G4605><s%> He Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> Through The <S%G303><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Borders <S%G3725><s%> Of Decapolis. <S%G1179><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Bring <S%G5342><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> A Deaf Man <S%G2974><s%> Who Spoke With Difficulty, <S%G3424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Beseech <S%G3870><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Might Lay <S%G2007><s%> On Him His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hand. <S%G5495><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken Away <S%G618><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3793><s%> ' Crowd <S%G2596><s%> Apart, <S%G2398><s%> He Put <S%G906><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1147><s%> His Fingers <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ears <S%G3775><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Spit <S%G4429><s%> He Touched <S%G680><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1100><s%> His Tongue, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Looked Up <S%G308><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> He Groaned, <S%G4727><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2188><s%> Ephphatha, <S%G3739><s%> That Is, <S%G2076><s%> Be Opened. <S%G1272><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Were Opened <S%G1272><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ears, <S%G189><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Loosed <S%G3089><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Band <S%G1199><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1100><s%> Of His Tongue, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Spoke <S%G2980><s%> Rightly. <S%G3723><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Charged <S%G1291><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> No One <S%G3367><s%> They Should Tell. <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3745><s%> But As Much As <S%G1161><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Charged, <S%G1291><s%> Exceeding <S%G3123><s%> <S%G4054><s%> They Proclaimed It : <S%G2784><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Above Measure <S%G5249><s%> They Were Astonished, <S%G1605><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> He Has Done : <S%G4160><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Deaf <S%G2974><s%> He Makes <S%G4160><s%> To Hear, <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dumb <S%G216><s%> To Speak. <S%G2980><s%>
